column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My favorite time to go is on New Year's Day for their Pajama Brunch.  The gimic is: wear your pajamas to brunch and receive a coupon for the amount you spend on brunch that you can use later.  It's like two for one
column2: and you don't even have to get dressed!  In fact
column3: even the servers wear their pajamas on New Year's day.
